statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.UploadType , BB.Name as UploadTypeName , AA.FileName
FROM IKBase.dbo.TFileUpload AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UploadType = BB.Code AND BB.ParentCode = 'UploadType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.UploadType = #UploadType#
AND ( AA.FileName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TFileUpload AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT * FROM IKBase.dbo.TFileUpload AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = ( SELECT MAX(ID) FROM IKBase.dbo.TFileUpload WHERE FileName = #FileName# )
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO IKBase.dbo.TFileUpload ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, UploadType, FileName ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #UploadType#, #FileName# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE IKBase.dbo.TFileUpload SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, UploadType = #UploadType# , FileName = #FileName# WHERE ID = #ID#
